headline.main: IF HITLER WINS; What It Might Mean to Us

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM (By Wireless). THE cataclysmic events on the West ern Front in France are shaking the world with the impact of an earthquake, rocking the founda tions of twentieth-century civilization.
